remarks: If ` x ` has a property ` A ` that is hereditary in the ` R ` -sequence, then every result of a application of the procedure ` R ` to ` x ` has the property ` A ` .  Proposition 74 of [Frege1879] p. 60.  (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: frege74 $p |- ( x e. A -> ( R hereditary A -> ( x R y -> y e. A ) ) ) $.
